name: Indian-Spiced Spinach (Saag)
author: Sylvia
description: Indian-Spiced Spinach (also known as Saag) is a gluten-free side dish that can be made vegan or vegetarian, or with chicken. Layered with Indian flavours (onion, ginger, garlic, coriander, cumin, and cardamom), but simple to prepare.
ingredients: 1/2 cup plain yogurt (dairy or non-dairy, not sweetened)
instructions: Defrost and cook the spinach according to the package directions. Set aside.
notes: Vegetarian variation: Add 1/2 cup paneer per person.
Meat-eater variation: Add 1 cup cooked chicken per person.
